P

prompt() - Static method in class Assignment4
Displays the list of available commands as follows: a or add to add a student in the class roll sa or average to sort the students based on their average sn or names to sort the students based on their last names r or remove to remove a student from the class roll s or save to save the list of students back to the input datafile c1 or change1 to change score 1 of a student c2 or c hange2 to change score 2 of a student c3 or change3 to change score 3 of a student f or find to find a student in the class roll d or display to display the class roll q or quit to exit the program (The program must ask for confirmation if there are unsaved data)
